pros: Generously padded and comfortable; Budget friendly daily trainer; Cushy midsole at the heel; Highly breathable; Secure lockdown; Comfortable and secure heel clutch; Feels stable underfoot; No lace bite
cons: Not for long or tempo runs; Lacking in overall durability; Tongue slips
RR_verdict: The Supernova 2 from Adidas is a daily running shoe that we deem great for easy and recovery runs on the road. With its $100 price tag, it's also a great-value option for newbies who want comfort and lightness packed into one. And if you're looking for a stable ride for short to medium-length runs, we know the Adidas Supernova 2 won't disappoint you.
